ing: 1 (6 ounce) jar marinated artichoke hearts, liquid reserved
3 cups chilled cooked long-grain white rice
1 (6 ounce) can pitted whole black olives, drained
des: "This is a great cold salad dish with little preparation time. It has a Greek flair to it and is delicious. I always come home with an empty dish. The key to it is using fresh tomatoes if you have them. Hope you enjoy it as much as we have."
ins: In a large bowl, mix the reserved artichoke marinade, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper. Gently mix the artichoke hearts, rice, tomatoes, onion, and olives into the bowl. Cover, and refrigerate until serving.
